title: Pluck values from list of dictionaries | Challenge
description: In this challenge, you will write a function that extracts a list of values from a list of dictionaries, given a specific key.

meta.title: Python | Dictionary | List of Dictionaries | Pluck Values
meta.description: Learn how to extract specific values from a list of dictionaries in Python using a simple function with list comprehension and dict.get().
meta.keywords: Python, Dictionary, List of Dictionaries, Pluck Values, Data Extraction

steps.title: Pluck values from list of dictionaries
